summary: Hey guys today i bring you another mod.  A FOLLOWER!!!!
descriptionHtml:
Hey guys this is the second mod i\'ve made so i hope you like it.


I decided to make a follower I called her dani 
she is sitting in the bench next to the guy who is always screaming about talos.

She is lvl 30 skill and perk distribution is acording to her lvl and race 



Update 1.3:

1. She is now marriable.

2. She can now train you in archery.

3. She Has her own bow which is FUCKING OVERPOWERED.


ENJOY!!!!
author: biohazar118
